005
006package dev.metaschema.oscal.tools.cli.core.utils;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactory;
010
011import org.w3c.dom.Document;
012import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
013
014import java.io.File;
015import java.io.IOException;
016import java.io.OutputStream;
017import java.nio.file.Files;
018
019import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory;
020import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
021import javax.xml.transform.OutputKeys;
022import javax.xml.transform.Transformer;
023import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
024import javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory;
025import javax.xml.transform.dom.DOMSource;
026import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamResult;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029
030/**
031 * Utility class for pretty-printing output files in various formats.
032 * <p>
033 * This class was originally contributed by Mahesh Kumar Gaddam (ermahesh) in
034 * <a href="https://github.com/usnistgov/oscal-cli/pull/295">PR #295</a>.
035 * </p>
036 */
037public final class PrettyPrinter {
038
039  private PrettyPrinter() {
040    // prevent instantiation
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Pretty-prints a JSON file in place.
045   *
046   * @param file
047   *          the JSON file to pretty-print
048   * @throws IOException
049   *           if an I/O error occurs
050   */
051  public static void prettyPrintJson(@NonNull File file) throws IOException {
052    ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
053    Object obj = mapper.readValue(file, Object.class);
054    mapper.writerWithDefaultPrettyPrinter().writeValue(file, obj);
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Pretty-prints a YAML file in place.
059   *
060   * @param file
061   *          the YAML file to pretty-print
062   * @throws IOException
063   *           if an I/O error occurs
064   */
065  public static void prettyPrintYaml(@NonNull File file) throws IOException {
066    ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper(new YAMLFactory());
067    Object obj = mapper.readValue(file, Object.class);
068    mapper.writerWithDefaultPrettyPrinter().writeValue(file, obj);
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Pretty-prints an XML file in place.
073   *
074   * @param file
075   *          the XML file to pretty-print
076   * @throws IOException
077   *           if an I/O error occurs
078   * @throws ParserConfigurationException
079   *           if a DocumentBuilder cannot be created
080   * @throws SAXException
081   *           if any parse errors occur
082   * @throws TransformerException
083   *           if an error occurs during transformation
084   */
085  public static void prettyPrintXml(@NonNull File file)
086      throws IOException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException, TransformerException {
087    Document doc = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance()
088        .newDocumentBuilder().parse(file);
089
090    TransformerFactory transformerFactory = TransformerFactory.newInstance();
091    Transformer transformer = transformerFactory.newTransformer();
092    transformer.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.INDENT, "yes");
093
094    try (OutputStream out = Files.newOutputStream(file.toPath())) {
095      transformer.transform(new DOMSource(doc), new StreamResult(out));
096    }
097  }
098}
